Uses of Package
bonzai.api

  • Classes in bonzai.api used by bonzai.api 
    Class and Description
    Actor
    An Actor describes the properties of a character in the game and gives you functions to control them if you are able.
    AIGameState
    AIGameState provides functions to get information and objects present in the world each turn.
    Blocker
    A Blocker is an Actor which can prevent movement onto its location using its block method.
    Cleaner
    Cleaners are Actors that have the ability to force Blockers into an unblocking position and to stun them for 6 turns.
    Hat
    Hats are Actors and your only source of point generation.
    Node
    A class that describes a node with the information known to a given team.
    Scout
    Scouts are Actors that can move twice in one turn and can see twice as far as every other Actor.
    WeightComparator
    An Interface for creating weight comparators
    Wizard
    Wizards are your main Actor.
